QuestData.Title: Reinforce the Veiled Den
QuestData.Description: The foothold you established allows us to check in with our field operatives.$b$bOn our last mission here, we set up a bastion to the northeast. It should be defensible for now, but that could change at any moment.$b$bIllidan has gone ahead to assess the situation. I suggest you go there and see if he needs a hand.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Illidan at the Veiled Den.

Objectives.Objective: Speak with Illidan at the Veiled Den.
